attributes.action: Declare the 18th of April, 'National Tea Day'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: From the pen of British-born screen-writer and director Guy Ritchie, comes the following immortal phrase, "The British empire was built on cups of tea and if you think I'm going to war without one, you're very much mistaken!". We think that in recognition of that Great British tradition, the humble cup of Tea, the prime minister should declare the 18th of April 2009, "National Tea Day".

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
